detail_desc: T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Wide jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a V-neck and long dolman sleeves. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and tapered legs.
Shorts in cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck and short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Relaxed fit with a pleat at the front and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Short shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Top in sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is partly recycled.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and print motif.
Cropped, fitted vest top in ribbed jersey with a square neckline front and back.
Shorts in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and diagonal side pockets.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with two handles and a swivel trigger snap hook at the top. Size 11.5x28x28.5 cm.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Cargo trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets and fake back pockets with a flap. Tapered legs with elasticated hems. Jersey lining.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Mid waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and full coverage at the back.
Hipster briefs in organic cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

Sleeveless maxi dress in a jacquard weave with a deep V-neck front and back and horizontal ties at the back. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a gathered seam at the waist and on the skirt for added width and volume. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled. Lined.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Sun hat in an organic, cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Ties under the chin. Width of brim 4 cm. Lined in organic cotton.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and a frill at the sides.
Cap in imitation leather with an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Scarf in a soft knit with yarn pompoms at the ends. Size 27x190 cm.
Trousers in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud and front and back pockets.

Playsuit in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck and knot detail at the front and long trumpet sleeves with inset hemstitch embroidery at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs. Lined at the bottom.
Calf-length skirt in a soft weave with a faux wrapover at the front, smocking at the back, a wide tie belt and rounded slits at the front. Longer at the back. Unlined.

Fleece-lined jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Reversible sequin appliqué at the top, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jacket in washed denim with worn details and sparkly stones. Flap chest pockets with a button and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: One-button satin tuxedo jacket in a cotton blend with a sheen. Shawl collar, chest pocket, jetted front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist, which combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Flip-flops with braided straw insoles and fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and legs and press-stud fasteners.
Baby Exclusive. Shorts in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and overlocked hems.
Straight dress in patterned sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs, and a braided imitation suede belt with a metal buckle.

Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck, wrapover front and short butterfly sleeves. Gathered seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and a gently flared skirt with embroidery and a flounced hem. Broderie anglaise around the neckline, sleeves and hem. Lined.

Leotard in stretch jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and a motif with glittery details on the front. Seam at the waist, a tiered, satin-lined tulle skirt and a detachable tulle cape with a shimmering pattern.

Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups to lift and shape the bust and a small opening at the front with support panels and narrow satin ribbon ties. Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide, elasticated lace trim at the hem and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Shirt in a striped viscose weave with a grandad collar, French front and pleat at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Short dress in patterned chiffon with frill trims and a V-neck with a concealed press-stud at the neckline. Sewn-in wrapover at the front, an elasticated seam at the waist, and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs. Lined.
Hair elastics in various designs without metal clips. Two with a glittery appliqué.
Set with a long-sleeved dress and pair of leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey. Dress with a flounce at the hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved, ribbed top in patterned cotton with a round neckline and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
Short chunky metal chain necklace. Adjustable length 40-47 cm.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams for added comfort, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Long-sleeved top in slub cotton jersey with a yoke at the front trimmed with a flounce in woven fabric with broderie anglaise.
Cardigan in a soft fine knit with a rounded collar, buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit sports socks in a soft cotton blend.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and press-stud (sizes 7-10Y with a normal button).
Mules in imitation suede with pointed toes. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a round neckline that has a small opening and concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and cuffs with two buttons. Unlined.
Imitation suede loafers with a moccasin seam at the front and loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles (soft soles in sizes 0-1).
Long-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck and lacing at the front. Smocked seam at the waist with a gently flared peplum, and smocking and a flounce at the cuffs.
Large plastic mug with a sealable silicone lid. Diameter 8.5 cm, height including lid 19.5 cm.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge, pile-lined tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a hook and loop tab at the top. Pile linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short, elasticated sleeves. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Balconette bra in lace and mesh with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Shirt in soft, washed denim with a collar, yoke at the back, press-studs down the front and flap chest pockets with a press-stud. Long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs.
Knee-length skirt in a jacquard weave with a pattern in shimmering gold-coloured thread. Pleats at the front to create volume and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back. Lined.

Underwired bra in lace with a small V-shaped opening at the front and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide hem.

Wide trousers in velvet made from recycled polyester. Close-fitting at the top with a high waist and button inside the waistband. Zip fly made partly from recycled polyester. Side pockets, and full-length legs with pleats for width and movement.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with a round neckline, a pointelle-knit section at the top, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with decorative V-shaped seams at the top. Slightly looser fit with an extra high waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Short shirt dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke front and back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
T-shirt in soft, airy jersey made from a silk and cotton blend with a round neck and straight hem.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Straight-cut coat in woven fabric with notch lapels, a button at the front and side pockets with a decorative flap and button. Unlined.
Shirt in woven fabric with a collar and buttons down the front. Chest pocket, yoke at the back and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide, ribbed trim at the cuffs and hem.
Flock-print tights with an elasticated waist.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a soft rib knit with a fluffy finish. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Straight-cut, off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy viscose weave with elastication and a small frill at the top, and wide 3/4-length raglan sleeves with a frill trim.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with reversible sequins on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins) and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Blouse in softly draping silk with a small frilled collar with ties at the front. Opening at the top, long sleeves with narrow cuffs and a covered button, and a rounded hem.
Top in soft jersey with a unique nursing feature, slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Sleeveless dress in an airy weave with elastication around the neckline and an elasticated seam at the waist. Flared skirt with vertical flounces all round and an asymmetric hem. Lined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Flared top in soft jersey with an elasticated neckline, flounce that continues over the shoulders and overlocked edges.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with long sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
